definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="30" y="190"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_random_patch_simple" inline="false"><field name="tries">96</field><field name="xzSpread">4</field><field name="ySpread">3</field><comment pinned="false" h="122" w="245">This block represents a block patch feature. The blocks will only generate in valid positions (for example, grass will never generate on a stone block). Patches of plants should be generated during the VEGETAL_DECORATION stage.</comment><value name="block"><block type="state_provider_randomized_int"><field name="property">blockstate</field><value name="source"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:FallenCoconutLeaves</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block being placed.</comment></block></value><value name="value"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">0</field><field name="max">3</field></block></value></block></value><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_is_air"><comment pinned="false" h="72" w="251">This condition is checked for every block that is being placed. Here we don't want the mushrooms to replace other blocks</comment></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_count"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We try to generate this feature twice in each chunk</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">0</field><field name="max">2</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="83" w="182">We then move each patch horizontally. This way they don't generate only in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">OCEAN_FLOOR</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We then move each feature to the highest solid block (which might be underwater)</comment><next><block type="placement_block_predicate_filter"><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_all_of"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="3"></mutation><value name="condition0"><block type="block_predicate_solid"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">-1</field><field name="z">0</field></block></value><value name="condition1"><block type="block_predicate_is_air"></block></value><value name="condition2"><block type="block_predicate_matching_blocks"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">-1</field><field name="z">0</field><value name="blockSet"><block type="block_holderset_list"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><field name="block0">Blocks.SAND#0</field><field name="block1">Blocks.SAND#0</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
